present.spanish: Me lavo las manos antes de cada comida.

present.spanish: Te lavas el pelo con champú especial.
present.english: You wash your hair with special shampoo.

present.spanish: Te lavás los dientes tres veces al día.
present.english: You brush your teeth three times a day.
